author: TomPegden
title: TomPegden published SPECIAL REPORT: Could Pearl of Africa help fill post-Brexit trade...
text:
SPECIAL REPORT: Could Pearl of Africa help fill post-Brexit trade gap? By TomPegden | Posted: December 21, 2016 0 COMMENTS SHARES 18th September 1972: Ugandan Asians arrive at Stansted Airport on the first of several specially chartered flights to Britain shortly after Ugandan military dicatator Idi Amin implements a new regime expelling all Asians from Uganda. VIEW GALLERY SPECIAL REPORT: Could Pearl of Africa help fill post-Brexit trade gap? X 
Copy link to paste in your message / 18th September 1972: Ugandan Asians arrive at Stansted Airport on the first of several specially chartered flights to... Clifton managing director Shahid Sheikh is chasing ways to support Ugandan entrepreneurs
